name: KT-1138
content:
KT-1138, nicknamed "Kaity" and "Kaitlyn," was a human female stormtrooper who served the First Order under General Hux.
KT-1138 was a First Order stormtrooper who assisted General Hux and Kylo Ren in the First Order's attempt to take over the kingdom in Disney Magic Kingdoms. Kaity is shown to be passionate about the First Order, despite Hux berating her for her enthusiasm. Her squad members referred to her as Kaity, despite Kaity considering it an unofficial name.
Outside of serving the First Order, Kaity also served as a guard for the Princess Dressing Room. She is noted to be a great archer, with the Disney Princesses referring to her as Kaitlyn.
